text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
A photorealistic medieval fantasy black screen, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses, exhibiting the fine texture of aged film grain. The visual is entirely dark, establishing a mood of somber remembrance. The overall palette is absent of color, characterized by deep, tactile blackness. 

Since the image is entirely black, no character or environmental references are strictly necessary, but the style MUST adhere to the mandatory visual style directive.
